thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Steve Bannister
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Steve Bannister

author: Steve Bannister
title: Steve Bannister
text:
A wide range of condition & availability is offered on this site giving buyers many options in their purchases. This can be somewhat confusing in not having first hand knowledge of the benchmark used for each catagory. In the past, I have had "new, used/poor, used/good.
I ordered many books on the first order and received duplicates of three or four selections and wonder if it was resulting from changing book condition acceptability during final ordering. I will be reviewing my original order documents in effort to prevent a reoccurrence on future orders.
I will definitely be returning to this site for future purchases as availability & price/condition remains.
